meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Heberling Andrea Lehman Ken DeBusk Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1564.

td.p: Mike Heberling, a marketing analyst originally from Temple, Pennsylvania
Andrea Lehman, a freelance editor from Trenton, New Jersey
Ken DeBusk, a computer instructor from Coldwater, Michigan (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,800)

tr.td: ARTISTS
CITY CUISINE
ROCK LYRICS
KIDDIE LITERATURE
THE U.S. ARMED FORCES
ANAGRAMS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Before revealing responses] Yes, indeed. "Suddenly you\'re a building", and they named one after her, a very famous, well-known Broadway theater.)
...
(Alex: [To Andrea] "The First Lady of the American Theatre".)
AndreaWho is Helen Hayes?
$1,000
MikeWho is Helen Hayes?
$6,999
KenWho
$7,500
Helen Hayes')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In NYC in 1955 she said, "An actress\'s life is so transitory--suddenly you\'re a building"')

tr.td: ACTRESSES
In NYC in 1955 she said, "An actress's life is so transitory--suddenly you're a building"
Ken
Andrea
Mike
3rd place: Mad Raq tennis rackets
2nd place: Merillat shelving system + Sanyo color TV
New champion: $13,999
Ken
Andrea
Mike

17 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)

24 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W
(including 1 DD)
